p: Based on the tips provided, please write down your self-reward plan here for doing the activities that you have decided to do.  Please place  one or more  tick   marks  for  the type of self-reward   you  will use and mention  when  you will give  yourself this reward .

thead:
When will I reward myself ?
I will give myself this reward WHEN/IF (please write the condition you set for rewarding yourself ( for example: Giving myself a treat/something nice to eat IF I wake up at least three days in this week at 7.30 am)
tbody: <input type = 'checkbox' class='td-3-6-1-1' name='list1' id='check1'   value='1' onclick = 'checkbox_label(this)' >
Marking my efforts on a simple graph/chart and putting it up prominently on a table/on a wall/cupboard
<input type = 'checkbox' class='td-3-6-2-1' name='list2' id='check2'  value='2' onclick = 'checkbox_label(this)'>
Writing a  happy note to myself in a diary
<input type = 'checkbox' class='td-3-6-3-1' name='list3' id='check3' value='3' onclick = 'checkbox_label(this)'>
Giving myself a treat/something nice to eat
<input type = 'checkbox' class='td-3-6-4-1' name='list4' id='check4' value='4' onclick = 'checkbox_label(this)'>
Spending some time doing something I like/want.
<input type = 'checkbox' class='td-3-6-5-1' name='list5' id='check5' value='5' onclick = 'checkbox_label(this)'>
Buying something for myself
<input type = 'checkbox' class='td-3-6-6-1' name='list6' id='check6' value='6' onclick = 'checkbox_label(this)'>
Any other way of rewarding myself.
